horse.//note: horse frames should be generated as a chained sequence: each frame uses the previous frame as a visual reference so the motion is continuous
horse.prompt: Top-down (bird's-eye) view of a horse character, Red mythical beast style of The Classic of Mountains and Seas, centered and running forward away from the camera (toward the top of the frame). proportions identical across frames. {frame_desc}. Style: chibi / stylized, clean linework, bright vivid colors. IMPORTANT: For consistency, generate the first frame as the base image; for each subsequent frame, use the previous frame as the primary visual reference and produce only a small, plausible motion delta (adjust leg positions, mane/tail flow, subtle body tilt) — do NOT change background, viewpoint, costume, or overall anatomy.
